definition: to read and re-read sth until one is familiar with it
cooked (of food)/ripe (of fruit)/mature (of seeds)/familiar/skilled/done/also pr. [shou2]
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
comma/phrase marked by pause

sentences.english: Go on learning the text in groups , and translate.
sentences.chinese: 小组内自学课文，熟读并翻译。

sentences.english: Be sure to review the Information about the collection of the zebra mussel data.
sentences.chinese: 要保证熟读有关收集斑马贻贝数据的说明。

sentences.english: Even as a young boy, Jesus was already well acquainted with the Scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣在年少的时候，早就熟读经文。

sentences.english: Read the words and copy them on P18.
sentences.chinese: 熟读并抄写第18页的单词。

sentences.english: Well, it's someone who reads Marx and Lenin .
sentences.chinese: 好，应该是一个熟读马克思和列宁的人。

sentences.english: Read and memorize the text on p45 and the rhyme on p50 (textbook).
sentences.chinese: 熟读并背诵第45页上的课文和第50页的儿歌。

sentences.english: Be sure the Information about the collection of the zebra mussel data.
sentences.chinese: 要保证熟读有关收集斑马贻贝数据的说明。

sentences.english: A. Read the dialogue and try to remember.
Read Tang poetry 300 will not make poetry can alsochant.
sentences.chinese: 熟读唐诗三百首，不会作诗也会吟。

sentences.english: Read the materials, remember the sentences and knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 熟读听力材料，记住重点句型。

sentences.english: No one can ever outgrow or neglect the Scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 再怎么熟读也不过份，当然，也没有人可以忽略圣经。

sentences.english: I think I am going to read one poem from Tang Dynasty every day.
sentences.chinese: “熟读唐诗三百首，不会作诗也会吟”。

sentences.english: Roscoe can read a profit and loss statement the way a symphonist reads a score .
sentences.chinese: 罗斯科研究盈方一览表就象作曲家熟读乐谱。

definition: to read intensively
to know by heart (so well that you can recite it backwards)
art of war/military strategy and tactics
to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
proficient (in sth)/to understand sth through and through
lit. ripe as a melon that rolls from its vine (idiom); fig. to know fluently/to know sth inside out/to know sth by heart
a book on the art of war
to be proficient in
erudite/widely read and knowledgeable
old language/the Classics/Classical Chinese as a literary model, esp. in Tang and Song prose/Classical Chinese as a school subject
to recite/to repeat from memory
lit. to quote the classics/to quote chapter and verse (idiom)
conversant with things past and present/erudite and informed
The Analects of Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
Mr Zuo's Spring and Autumn Annals, attributed to famous blind historian Zuo Qiuming 左丘明[Zuo3 Qiu1 ming2]/usually called Zuo Zhuan 左傳|左传[Zuo3 Zhuan4]
“Art of War”, one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1], written by Sun Tzu 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3]
